alert.note: Alert for Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:42PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Washington County through 415 PM CDT... At 342 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 3 miles west of Greenland, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Farmington... Prairie Grove... West Fork... Lincoln... Greenland... Drake Field Airport... Prairie Grove Battlefield State... Walnut Grove... Hogeye... Viney Grove... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 51 and 59. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
